title: Bug 6125 - JAR packager reports open files very late
description: When pressing 'Finish' in the JAR packager, an error message is displayed: 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'5.
OB: When attempting to create a JAR using the packager, the process fails and displays the error message 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'5' without providing further details.
EB: When pressing 'Finish' in the JAR packager, the JAR creation should be successful and no error message should be displayed.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open a file but do not save it. 2. Open the JAR packager for the corresponding project. 3. Fill in all required fields such as path, destination, name, and description. 4. Press 'Finish' to create the JAR.
